description.value:
Wondrous Item, Common
When thrown, the seed turns into a magical, swift courser with an Intelligence score of 14 and the ability to speak Common and Umbral. It will carry you for up to 30 miles, delivering you to a particular place or following a particular road or path.
If engaged in combat, the stallion acts as a normal warhorse. It flees (with you) at the first opportunity.
